title: In the public interest
creator_credit: S M S Audiovisual, Victorian Film Corporation, Lindsay Parker and Colin Pym
brief_description: A film about the work of the Victorian Police and the various areas of involvement. Shown is the work of the Mounted Police in crowd control, the patrol cars, involvement in scenes of fires and burglaries, scientific investigation, the dog squad and boat patrol crews.
creator_credit_for_label: S M S Audiovisual, Victorian Film Corporation, Lindsay Parker and Colin Pym
